name: MyCityLink - Redesign
detail: A re-design project initiated based on user feedback, CakePHP 2.3 upgrade, responsive design and workflow optimisations.

name: Portal - Redesign
detail: After growing organically for many years, this redesign worked on optimising user workflows and simplifying the data presented by peeling away layers of UI.

name: Portal
detail: Imagined, designed and built core company web app founded around consolidating data and presenting it in useful ways.

name: MyCityLink
detail: Industry first Customer Suite of Parcel Tracking apps mashing up driver GPS data with mapping visualisations.
